signal.name: DeviceConnected
signal.tp:docstring: Signal sent out when a device is connected. Currently, the signal is only sent out for devices that have Thunderbolt (TBT) capability. This signal is sent out every time an alt mode is entered; this includes events like login/logout/screen unlock.

arg.name: type
arg.tp:docstring: Type of the device which was connected. It can be one of the enum values of typecd::DeviceConnectedType. See platform2/system_api/dbus/typecd/dbus-constants.h

signal.name: CableWarning
signal.tp:docstring: Cable connected may limit partner's performance or support. It can be the values of typecd::CableWarningType. See platform2/system_api/dbus/typecd/dbus-constants.h

arg.name: type
arg.tp:docstring: Type of limitation caused by cable. It can be one of the enum values of typecd::CableWarningType. See platform2/system_api/dbus/typecd/dbus-constants.h

method.name: GetAltModes
method.tp:docstring: Method to request a list of alternate modes supported by a partner or cable from typecd.

arg.name: alt_modes
arg.tp:docstring: Returned list of supported alternate modes. Alternate modes are represented by a tuple with a uint16_t value containing the SVID and a uint32_t value containing the VDO.

method.name: GetCurrentMode
method.tp:docstring: Method to request the current mode of a USB-C port on the system.

arg.name: mode
arg.tp:docstring: Current mode of the port. This value can contain one of the supported alternate modes (DPAM, TBT3), USB4 or signal that the port is not currently using a mode or connected to a partner device.

method.name: GetIdentity
method.tp:docstring: Method to request the Discover Identity response from a currently connected partner or cable.

arg.name: identity
arg.tp:docstring: Discovery Identity response from the partner or cable. This includes the ID Header VDO, Cert Stat VDO, Product VDO and Product Type VDOs stored sequentially in an vector.

method.name: GetPLD
method.tp:docstring: Method to request the Physical Location of Device (PLD) for a port.

arg.name: pld
arg.tp:docstring: Physical location of device stored in a tuple of 3 uint8_t variables. They are ordered Panel, Horizontal Location, then Vertical Location.

method.name: GetPortCount
method.tp:docstring: Method to request the number of USB-C ports on a system.

arg.name: port_count
arg.tp:docstring: Unsigned integer containing the number of USB-C ports on the system.

method.name: GetRevision
method.tp:docstring: Method to request the USB PD revision of a currently connected partner or cable.

arg.name: revision
arg.tp:docstring: USB PD Revision of the connected partner or cable in BCD format. The upper 8 bits contain major revision and the lower 8 bits contain minor revision.

method.name: SetPeripheralDataAccess
method.tp:docstring: Sets value in typecd to track the user's peripheral data access setting.

arg.name: enabled
arg.tp:docstring: Used to signal the user's peripheral data access setting. Set to true if it is enabled and false if it is disabled.

method.name: SetPortsUsingDisplays
method.tp:docstring: Sets value in typecd to track which ports are currently driving displays.

arg.name: enabled
arg.tp:docstring: List of ports that have a display connected, either directly or through a dock.
